scripts.build:prod: del-cli public/xsdccm/*.js && ngc -p tsconfig.aot.json && ngc -p tsconfig.aot.json && webpack --config webpack.config.prod.js --progress --profile --bail && del-cli 'assets/app/**/*.js' 'assets/app/**/*.ngsummary.json' 'assets/app/**/*.ngstyle.*'
scripts.build:spdx: del-cli dist/spdx/xsdsrv/public/xsdccm/*.js && ngc -p tsconfig.aot.json && ngc -p tsconfig.aot.json && webpack --config dist/spdx/webpack.config.prod.js --progress --profile --bail && del-cli 'assets/app/**/*.js' 'assets/app/**/*.ngsummary.json' 'assets/app/**/*.ngstyle.*'
scripts.build:icxml: del-cli dist/icxml/xsdsrv/public/xsdccm/*.js && ngc -p tsconfig.aot.json && ngc -p tsconfig.aot.json && webpack --config dist/icxml/webpack.config.prod.js --progress --profile --bail && del-cli 'assets/app/**/*.js' 'assets/app/**/*.ngsummary.json' 'assets/app/**/*.ngstyle.*'
